text: (O tun ri bee) nitori ki O le safi han awon t’o sobe-selu (ninu awon musulumi). (Awon onigbagbo ododo) si so fun won pe: “E maa bo, ki a lo jagun fun esin Allahu tabi e wa daabo bo emi ara yin.” Won wi pe: “Awa iba mo ogun-un ja awa iba tele yin.” Won sunmo aigbagbo ni ojo yen ju igbagbo lo. Won n fi enu won so ohun ti ko si ninu okan won. Allahu si nimo julo nipa ohun ti won n fi pamo
